Mr. Sanders helpfully identified the term moir=E9, which I confusedly misto=
ok for something Japanese.

On my HP scanner, the Descreen option under Adv=
anced settings is there precisely to cancel out undesirable moir=E9 effects=
, which I find occur in scanned images of some photographs and postcards.  =
Possibly Canon uses a different term.  Just type "moir=E9" in the Search fe=
ature in Help, and I'm sure it will identify Canon's equivalent option.
  -=
